item.title: Quickly Level or Reset Your Character's Attributes with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate!
item.description: Receive free rewards with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate including an assortment of in-game goodies!
item.content:encoded:
Receive free rewards with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate including an assortment of in-game goodies!

Starting today, you can unlock a variety of perks through Xbox Game Pass Ultimate! Begin your membership and you'll gain access to the following free in-game goodies:

  • 1× Attribute Respecification Scroll
  • 3× Gold Coast Experience Scrolls
    • Upon use, each of these scrolls will allot you an additional 50% experience point boost from all sources for 1 hour.
      • The timer will pause while you are offline and will resume once you return.

Looking to quickly level up or change up your character's health, magicka, and stamina attributes? Then this collection of complimentary rewards is perfect for you! From now until October 13, 2024 at 12PM EDT, you can pick up the 10-Year Anniversary Pack #3 by following these simple steps:

  1. Navigate to your Xbox Home dashboard and select Game Pass
  2. Navigate to Perks
  3. Find and select the ESO perks (10-Year Anniversary Pack #3)
  4. Select the Claim button to receive a code
  5. Select Redeem code and input it into the code field
    • It will auto-populate the code field—do not alter it
  6. Select Check Code and then Next
  7. Finally, select Confirm to receive your in-game items!

Complete the steps listed above and your free perks will be waiting for you to collect! Please keep in mind, an Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscription is required to obtain these rewards.

Don't forget, these Game Pass perks will only be available for a limited time, so grab them before they're gone! Click here to learn about more tantalizing offers that await those with an Xbox Game Pass Ultimate membership! Are you prepared to level fast and tweak your characters important base attributes to suit your build? Let us know via X (Formerly Twitter), Instagram, or Facebook.

item.title: Play ESO on GeForce NOW to Claim a Free and Tasty Emote
item.description: Experience The Elder Scrolls Online using
item.content:encoded:
Experience The Elder Scrolls Online using NVIDIA's GeForce NOW and you can claim the Skingrad Noble Snack emote.

The 10-Year Anniversary Celebration continues with another promotion with NVIDIA's GeForce NOW, where you can earn a new emote to use while you play ESO on a device of your choosing (now including supported mobile devices as well).

NVIDIA's GeForce NOW members can claim their free emote by opting into rewards and checking their email for instructions. Premium members can redeem starting today, while free members can claim it starting August 9 at 12PM EDT. It's available until September 8 on a first come, first served basis.

Luxuriate like a pampered noble

If you are a Steam or Epic Games Store player, you can stream ESO to your devices using NVIDIA's GeForce NOW cloud gaming service, which was revealed during April's kickoff of the 10-Year Anniversary Celebration. Sign up for NVIDIA's highest performance membership, Ultimate, and you can stream at up to 4K and 120 fps or enjoy the game at ultrawide resolutions on supported devices. To sign up or find more information and support, visit their official website.

Are you prepared to relax and enjoy the life (or at least the snacks) of a Skingrad noble? NVIDIA's GeForce NOW can make such easy living (and gaming) a reality. Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook.

item.title: Kick Off Your Elder Scrolls Online Adventure for Free During QuakeCon 2024
item.description: Explore the ever-expanding world of Tamriel without even touching your coin purse during the QuakeCon 2024 Free Play Event!
item.content:encoded:
Explore the ever-expanding world of Tamriel without even touching your coin purse during the QuakeCon 2024 Free Play Event!

Adventure Awaits!

The QuakeCon 2024 Free Play Event kicks off today and will continue until Monday, August 19, 2024. Throughout the free play period, you can experience the vast world of Tamriel as well as the countless adventures that await at no cost on PC/Mac (The Elder Scrolls Online Store and Epic Games Store) and Xbox and PlayStation* consoles.

Ready to get started? Then head over to the Free Play page and select your platform!

During the QuakeCon 2024 Free Play Event, you'll gain access to the ESO base game, including four of the game's classes (Sorcerer, Nightblade, Templar, and Dragonknight), 24 zones to explore, as well as ESO's PvP game modes: Battlegrounds and the Alliance War.

Additionally, you can begin this year's newest adventure by accessing the free Gold Road Prologue quest through the in-game Crown Store!

Tamriel ready to be explored

Already participated in previous years' free play events? You can pick up right where you left off, continuing your adventures with no progression lost. Even more exciting, all brand-new ESO accounts created also receive 500 crowns to spend in the in-game Crown Store.

After the QuakeCon Free Play Event reaches its conclusion on August 19, you can continue your saga by purchasing the full version of ESO via the Buy Now page. You couldn't pick a better time to begin your Tamrielic adventure as both ESO Standard Edition and the latest Chapter, Gold Road, are currently on sale for a limited time. Don't miss out!

Play for Free!

Experience a world with abundant epic quests and unforgettable characters at no cost during the QuakeCon 2024 Free Play Event. Are you prepared to delve into The Elder Scrolls Online and begin your adventure? Let us know via X (Formerly Twitter), Instagram, or Facebook.

The QuakeCon 2024 Free Play Event is now live and runs until Monday, August 19, 2024.

*Active PlayStation Plus subscription required for PlayStation users.

item.title: Anniversary Celebration—Play ESO to Acquire an Intimidating Costume from Alienware!
item.description: Steam players can unlock free in-game rewards simply by playing ESO via this exciting 10-year Anniversary partnership with Alienware!
item.content:encoded:
Steam players can unlock free in-game rewards simply by playing ESO via this exciting 10-year Anniversary partnership with Alienware!

The 10-Year Anniversary Celebration is still going strong, as is ESO's continued partnership with Alienware™. This means even more in-game rewards to claim! During the next phase of this ongoing promotion, you and your fellow Steam players can obtain the Grim Harvester costume and ×3 Grand Gold Coast Experience Scrolls by collectively playing 70,000 hours of ESO from now until Monday, August 12.

The Grim Harvester costume

To participate in this community promotional event, you'll need to sign in or create a free account with Alienware Arena and connect your Steam account by following the steps below:

  1. Travel to the account settings page
  2. Select the Steam icon and sign into your Steam account
  3. Next, open Steam and navigate to your profile
  4. Select “Edit Profile” and navigate to “Privacy Settings”
  5. Change “My Basic Details”, “My Profile”, and "Game Details" to Public.
  6. Uncheck "Always keep my total playtime private even if users can see my game details"

By following these steps, Alienware Arena can log the community's cumulative playtime until it reaches its 70,000-hour cap. Once the #ESOFam has reached the finish line, all eligible players can collect their free rewards!

To claim these goodies, travel to the giveaway's page and select “GET KEY”. Afterward, you can redeem your Reward Code on the official ESO website using these steps:

  1. Copy the Reward Code provided in your email from Alienware
  2. Confirm that you own a copy of The Elder Scrolls Online before redeeming a Reward Code
  3. Navigate to this URL and sign into your ESO account: https://account.elderscrollsonline.com/en-us/redeem-code
  4. Enter the code and click Redeem Code to submit

For more information and support, visit Alienware's official website.

Are you prepared to terrify your foes while adorning the macabre guise of the Grim Harvester? Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook.

item.title: ESO's August 2024 Survival Guide
item.description: QuakeCon, the 10-Year Anniversary, Update 43, and more awaits within another jam-packed month for The Elder Scrolls Online!
item.content:encoded:
QuakeCon, the 10-Year Anniversary, Update 43, and more awaits within another jam-packed month for The Elder Scrolls Online!

This August 2024, you can check out fun QuakeCon livestreams, enjoy more 10-Year Anniversary promotions, and check out the base-game additions coming with the free Update 43 patch. Here's everything you need to know for this upcoming month!


Daily Login Rewards (8/1–8/31)

A new month means new daily rewards, including the red-hot Flame Atronach Senche-Jaguar pet and more. Get a preview of what is available in this blog.


Anniversary Spotlight—The Portals of Oblivion (8/5–9/3)

A fiery host of pets is up for grabs during August's Anniversary Spotlight. Check out all the details in this announcement blog!


Alienware 10-Year Anniversary Promotion (8/5-8/12)

Keep an eye out for a special 10-Year Anniversary promotion from our friends at Alienware, giving the community a chance to unlock the Grim Harvester costume and an XP scroll. You'll find more info on Alienware Arena or elderscrollsonline.com very soon.


Gilded Glory Mini Event (8/8–8/13)

Purse feeling a little light? Enjoy a 100% boost to gold gains from in-game activities (quest rewards, monster kills, etc.) for a limited time. Note that this does NOT include gold made via selling to vendors or with guild traders.


NVIDIA GeForce NOW 10-Year Anniversary Promotion (8/8-9/8)

NVIDIA GeForce NOW gets in on the 10-Year Anniversary fun with a special emote giveaway (the tasty Skingrad Noble Snack). Keep an eye on elderscrollsonline.com for more details soon.


QuakeCon Trial High Score Competition Livestream (8/9)

Two top-tier PvE guilds race to complete ESO's latest Trial, and we're streaming the whole thing live on Twitch.TV/Bethesda Friday, August 9 at 5PM EDT—don't forget to link your Twitch and ESO accounts as drops will be active!


QuakeCon Charity Livestreams (8/9–8/10)

Help us help Dallas Pets Alive by tuning into special QuakeCon charity livestreams starting on Friday, August 9. Look out for a special stream from the ESO community team on Twitch.TV/Bethesda August 10, too! There. Will. Be. Puppies!


Game Pass Perks (8/14-10/13)

A new wave of Game Pass Perks unlock for Xbox players on Wednesday, August 14. Look out for an official announcement on elderscrollsonline.com with all the details that day.


Battlegrounds Crazy King Mini Event (8/15–8/20)

Take to the Battlegrounds and enjoy non-stop Crazy King matches during this special PvP mini-event.


PC/Mac Update 43 Base-Game Patch Launch (8/19)

PC/Mac players can explore the Infinite Archive's new arenas and rewards or show off their abodes to the world with Home Tours thanks to the free Update 43 base-game patch. Play on console? Don't worry, Update 43 arrives for Xbox and PlayStation on September 4.


Gamescom 2024 Livestream (8/22)

We're live from gamescom! Tune in to Twitch.TV/Bethesda as Community Managers Gina Bruno and Amy Schlueter talk with ESO Game Director Rich Lambert and ZOS Studio Head Matt Firor. Together, they'll discuss the ongoing 10-Year Anniversary Celebration, Update 43, and more! Look out for more details on elderscrollsonline.com soon.

With QuakeCon, gamescom, and a new base-game update, August is shaping up to be a fun one for ESO and its community. Be sure to keep an eye out for more information on the above events, promotions, and livestreams when they happen. Are you excited about what's to come this August? Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook.

item.title: Crown Store Showcase—August 2024
item.description: Check out the new mounts, houses, and other exciting collectibles coming to the Crown Store this August!
item.content:encoded:
Check out the new mounts, houses, and other exciting collectibles coming to the Crown Store this August!

The summer is heating up, and so are the offerings from the Crown Store! Find fiery finery and hot new items to make the most of the month. Be sure to head over to the Crown Store page to check out the currently available items. One or more of these goodies catch your eye? Then drop by the Buy Crowns page and secure however many crowns you need! Certain items and offers will be available for a limited time only, so be sure to read their details below and don't miss out.

ESO Plus Deals

All ESO Plus™ members have access to a monthly selection of exclusive deals and items. You can find more information about them in this article.

Exclusive Free Items

Painting: The Stitches

Located within the Scar in Northern Elsweyr, the Stitches draws the eye of many an artist seeking the challenge of illustrating a more vertically oriented settlement.

The Painting: The Stitches will be available in the Crown Store FREE, exclusively to ESO Plus Members on all platforms for a limited time, from August 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to October 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Statuette: Auriel of Garlas Agea

A miniature statue of Auriel, King of the Aldmer. Based on the storied effigy of the same name in the ruins of Garlas Agea along the Gold Coast.

The Statuette: Auriel of Garlas Agea will be available in the Crown Store FREE, exclusively to ESO Plus Members on all platforms for a limited time, from July 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Crown Gem and Seals of Endeavor Items

Celestial Lynx

Swift as a stream and silent as a shadow, this creature appears in many folktales across Tamriel. In some, the lynx stalks its quarry across the night sky. In others it's an agile companion, perfect for worthy hunters prowling the darkest nights.

The Celestial Lynx mount will be available for Crown Gems and Seals of Endeavor on all platforms for a limited time, from August 8, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Blazeborn Wolf

None can say the Blazeborn Wolf lacks a bold appearance, formed from flames as it is. Even bolder, though, is its temperament, making it a perfect companion for racing through icy wastes to confront foes you deem worthy of your courage!

The Blazeborn Wolf mount will be available for Crown Gems and Seals of Endeavor on all platforms for a limited time, from August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to September 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Crafting

Crown Crafting Motif: Elder Argonian

Concordia Mercius of Cyrodilic Collections writes, "The similarity of designs and motifs found during our expeditions across Black Marsh suggest that the Argonians once may have had a more unified civilization, or perhaps simply traded more widely." Use to learn the Elder Argonian crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Elder Argonian will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Elder Argonian Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Tribal Armor Crates, awarded by completing daily quests in Murkmire.

Crown Crafting Motif: Silver Rose

Chief Archivist Bartholomew states, “Like our namesake, the liveries of the venerable Knights of the Silver Rose have grown haler and more beautiful with each generation, tended by collective wisdom and guidance of our order.” Use to learn the Silver Rose crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Silver Rose will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Silver Rose Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Prior Thierric Sarazen in the Red Petal Bastion dungeon. Harder difficulties will increase the chances of the item dropping.

Crown Crafting Motif: Black Fin Legion

Keshu the Black Fin notes, “From head to toe, the Black Fin legionnaire must dress for conditions that destroy the arms and armor of other lands. But if the swamp is an enemy to the unprepared, it can also be a potent ally for the warrior who learns its ways.” Use to learn the Black Fin Legion crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Black Fin Legion will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Black Fin Legion Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Leyawiin Reward Coffers, awarded by completing delve daily quests for Deetum-Jas in Leyawiin.

Crown Crafting Motif: Stags of Z'en

Gwaerelos, Greenblessed Master of Arms, states: "We Stags exact punishment for transgression and wickedness, seeking payment in kind. We claim that payment in blood. Z'en, god of toil and vengeance, demands nothing less.” Use to learn the Stags of Z'en crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Stags of Z'en will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 19, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Stags of Z'en Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Maarselok in the Lair of Maarselok dungeon. Harder difficulties will increase the chances of the item dropping.

Crown Crafting Motif: Waking Flame

Dress and armor yourself in the fashion to best please Lord Dagon and commit atrocities on the tiresome "innocents" roaming Tamriel! Use to learn the Waking Flame crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Waking Flame will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 26, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Waking Flame Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Baron Zaudrus in The Cauldron dungeon. Harder difficulties will increase the chances of the item dropping.

Crown Crafting Motif: Pyre Watch

Tazheq at-Rajd writes, "A horror rests within this Unhallowed Grave. Know well our order's arms and armor that give us the strength to defend the living. Because, the Gray Host shall not wake. Death must be the end." Use to learn the Pyre Watch crafting style.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Pyre Watch will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to September 2, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Pyre Watch Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Kjalnar Tombskald in the Unhallowed Grave dungeon. Harder difficulties will increase the chances of the item dropping.

Outfit Style

Prior Thierric Arms Pack

Venturing into Red Petal Bastion, the stronghold of a knightly order that has fallen from grace, puts you on a path to confront the deadly Prior Thierric Sarazen. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Prior Thierric awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Prior Thierric Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Prior Thierric Sarazen from veteran Red Petal Bastion. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Prior Offenses” increases the drop chances of both items.

Valkyn Skoria Arms Pack

The minion of Mehrunes Dagon, Valkyn Skoria, awaits any who seek to close an Oblivion Gate in the City of Ash. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Valkyn Skoria awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Valkyn Skoria Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Valkyn Skoria from veteran City of Ash II. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Glirion the Redbeard for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Glirion's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “A World On Fire” increases the drop chances of both items.

Stonekeeper Arms Pack

The Dwarven Colossus called Stonekeeper awaits any seeking to explore the newly unearthed Frostvault. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Stonekeeper awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Stonekeeper Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 8, 2024 at 1PM EDT, to August 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from the Stonekeeper from veteran Frostvault. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Vault Cracker” increases the drop chances of both items.

Kargaeda Arms Pack

Confront the powerful gryphon Kargaeda in what Urgarlag Chief-bane calls the "glorious mess" that the Ascendant Order and yaghra have made of Coral Aerie. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Kargaeda awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Kargaeda Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Varallion from veteran Coral Aerie. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Superior Pedigree” increases the drop chances of both items.

Elder Scrolls Artifact: Sword of Jyggalag

Alter your two-handed sword's Outfit style with a replica of the Sword of Jyggalag Elder Scrolls Artifact, the claymore created by the absent Prince of Order.

The Elder Scrolls Artifact: Sword of Jyggalag will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 19, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Infernal Guardian Arms Pack

The blazing lurcher called the Infernal Guardian may prove a worthy challenge to any seeking to confront enemies within the City of Ash. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Infernal Guardian awards by using this set of Outfit styles.

The Infernal Guardian Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 19, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 26, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Razor Master Erthas from veteran City of Ash I. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Glirion the Redbeard for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Glirion's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Fire Brigade” increases the drop chances of both items.

Encratis's Behemoth Arms Pack

Pyroturge Encratis of the True-Sworn and his fire behemoth creations enjoy a good conflagration, making them worthy opponents to any who dare traverse Black Drake Villa. Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Encratis's Behemoth awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Encratis's Behemoth Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to September 2, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Pyroturge Encratis from veteran Black Drake Villa. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 Undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Snuffed Out” increases the drop chances of both items.

Adornment

The Standing Wave

Do you stand tall and proud, adventurer? Then so should your hair! Add to your already impressive height with The Standing Wave, the hairdo that's sweeping the Fighters Guild.

The Standing Wave adornment will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to September 2, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Wardrobe

Pellitine Tea-Fete Gown

Originally worn during the ancient Pa'alatiin clan's tradition of taking tea, this classic garment's popularity has resurged in recent months, making it the perfect dress for any Khajiiti gathering.

The Pellitine Tea-Fete Gown will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Vinedusk Vigilant

Among the Vinedusk Rangers lurks an even more dangerous force: assassin-scouts who move quietly through forests, dealing with any who pose a threat. Sometimes called "tree ghosts," they wear custom-made gear that works with their preferred combat styles.

The Vinedusk Vigilant will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 19, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Liespinner's Vestments

Acolytes of Mephala spread falsehoods and disinformation to keep their secrets hidden. When they meet, they don these vestments to conceal their identities. Beware her whispers beneath the veil.

The Liespinner's Vestments will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 19, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Dragon Priest

Once, it is said, a cult of Dragon-worshipers ruled all of northern Tamriel. Their leaders were Dragon Priests, cruel clerics of great power who hid their faces under magical masks. Now you can wear the semblance of these legendary magi.

The Dragon Priest will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 26, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Skins

Mind-Shriven

This costume gives the wearer the appearance of those tragic mortals whose will and mentality have been stolen by Molag Bal.

The Mind-Shriven skin will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Crate

Nightfall Crate

A mystery collection of Nightfall related items!

Nightfall Crates will return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 8, 2024 at 1PM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Wraithtide Crate

A mystery collection of Wraithtide related items!

Wraithtide Crates will return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to September 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Events

Currency

Event Tickets

A ticket used to purchase rare goods from The Impresario, Event Merchant. Curious as to what goods? Well, chat with her to see what she has to offer!

Single Event Tickets will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time during the Whitestrike's Mayhem event, from July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 6, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Event Tickets are also giftable to other players from within the Crown Store.

Furniture

Music Box, Ascension to the Ruby Throne

When activated, plays the majestic music box composition "Ascension to the Ruby Throne."

Music Box, Feast of All Flames

Daedric Statue, Sanguine

Add to the exuberant atmosphere of any gathering with this rose-bestrewn statue of Sanguine, the Daedric Prince of Revelry. Let drifts of petals caress bare skin. Draw eyes with a flash of crimson. Then showcase the statue's illusions all at once.

The new Daedric Statue, Sanguine will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 8, 2024 at 1PM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Statue, Vampiric Sovereign

The vile enchantments placed upon this statue make it a grim reminder of a vampire's power. Whether cloaked in bats, imbued with dark energies, or wreathed in flame, weak-hearted mortals will never forget the sight of it.

The Statue, Vampiric Sovereign will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Statue, Prince of Ambition

Sweltering chaos accompanies this colossal statue of Mehrunes Dagon, the Prince of Destruction. Whether you prefer his smoldering heat, fiery gaze, blazing axe, or the full force of his inferno, this statue will bring sublime terror to any home.

The Statue, Prince of Ambition will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Furnishing Pack: Daedric Ambitions

Build your own imposing edifices with these structural pieces and accessories. Will your enemies—and maybe even friends—quail at the results of your labors? Yes, yes, they will.

The Furnishing Pack: Daedric Ambitions will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Houses

Potentate's Retreat

Originally built by the Potentate Versidue-Shaie as a retreat from Senchal, this manor contains roomy spaces in which to entertain guests. A terraced area features a flooded aeonstone crater as well as luminescent flora transplanted from Moonlit Cove.

Potentate's Retreat returns to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.

Zhan Khaj Crest

Breezes carry verdant scents from the nearby jungle to caress the sand gardens in this former Desert Wind adeptorium. Though no longer a site of Khajiit practicing a dual-sword technique, this riverside location serves well as a meditative getaway.

The new Zhan Khaj Crest will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 8, 2024 at 1PM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.

Agony's Ascent

Cautioning whispers about these dominating spires convince the wary to avoid the place for fear of torture … or worse. Those with courage, though, might find the stalwart tower and commanding views make for an imposing Oblivion keep.

Agony's Ascent returns to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.

Tel Galen

Fulfill your fantasies of a fungal flat with this fabulous Telvanni wizard's tower, on a private island on Azura's Coast! Comes complete with grand foyer, workshop, suite, and tower chamber ideal for magical research.

Tel Galen returns to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to September 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.

Houseguests

Druid Ryvana

Mysterious and kind, Druid Ryvana welcomes the chance to teach others about the wisdom of the Stonelore Druids. What teachings has she for you? After adding Ryvana to your home, you can set her on a path, plus you and your visitors can speak with her.

Druid Ryvana will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Imperial Legionary Larina

A series of defeats in the Three Banners War led veteran Larina to take some leave to recuperate before her next battle in Cyrodiil. Will you give her a place to rest? After adding Larina to your home, you can set her on a path.

The new Imperial Legionary Larina will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 8, 2024 at 1PM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Mounts

Manelord Nightmare Senche

King of the Nightmare Pride, this night-black senche-tiger has burning paws and flames hissing from its face; rumor says Mehrunes Dagon is responsible.

The Manelord Nightmare Senche mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Seaghost Pillion Moose

"I've always preferred moose to elk or horses. In battle they're more reliable, they're cussed strong, and for overland travel they can't be beat. Plus, their noses are just so soft!"—Yvon Serielle, Daggerfall

The new Seaghost Pillion Moose mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 8, 2024 at 1PM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Grudge-Rock Welwa

These petulant welwas hail from Wrothgar and more than live up to their name. Hardened by their difficult landscape, the creatures delight in punishing their riders for the smallest slight, whether it's a late feeding or a slightly too-tight saddle.

The new Grudge-Rock Welwa mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 12, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT.

Dremnaken Wrathsteed

"Dremnaken are fearsome creatures with crushing footpads and jagged teeth that promise only pain. Anyone who can strap armor onto one's back and ride it into battle should be doubly feared. That's only logical."—Nororlie, Alinor Daedrology Society

The Dremnaken Wrathsteed mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Nightfall Sabre Cat

The Reachmen of the upper Karth valley, who train them as mounts, swear that the Nightfall variant is sacred to the Daedric Prince Nocturnal.

The Nightfall Sabre Cat mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 19, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Midnight Cantor Senche-raht

After spending years expelling dro-m'Athra from Nirn, M'aar decided to follow a new path. Now they hope to explore as much of the Mundus as possible before venturing to the Gates of the Crossing.

The Midnight Cantor Senche-raht mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 26, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Rubyflare Torchnix

"Legends claim the Erabenimsun tamed these luminous creatures after Ashu-Ammu rode the first nix-ox into battle. While it's strange to choose a steed whose glow gives away your position, some warriors delight in added danger before battle."—Murdyn Athren

The Rubyflare Torchnix mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to September 2, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Personality

Swashbuckler

You've braved dangerous waters and seedy back-alleys. Now, on land or sea, your telltale swagger marks you as someone who's comfortable in all manner of deadly environments!

The Swashbuckler personality will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from August 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 26, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.

Emote

Sweep your hands into a gesture revering the moons, Jone and Jode, with this Khajiiti greeting.

item.description: A fiery host of rewards (voted for by you, the community) await those willing to clash with the minions of Mehrunes Dagon during the Portals of Oblivion Anniversary Spotlight.
item.content:encoded:
A fiery host of rewards (voted for by you, the community) await those willing to clash with the minions of Mehrunes Dagon during the Portals of Oblivion Anniversary Spotlight.

August's Red-Hot Rewards

Our 10-Year Anniversary spotlights continue with the Portals of Oblivion, challenging you to invade Mehrunes Dagon's realm of destruction. Starting August 5 at 10AM EDT and running until September 3 at 10AM EDT, if you have unlocked either the Blackwood Portal Punisher or Deadlands Portal Punisher achievement, you can claim the Flame Atronach Pony Guar pet for free from the in-game Crown Store.

The Flame Atronach Pony Guar pet

To unlock either one of these achievements, you must enter 10 Oblivion Portals in the zone and destroy the antecedent catalyst devices within. Once you have earned either the Blackwood or Deadlands Portal Punisher achievement, you can claim the free pet from the Crown Store.

Even better, unlock the Oblivion Obliterator achievement by defeating all the bosses found within Oblivion Portals and you can also claim the new Firebelly Shalk pet from the Crown Store as a bonus reward.

The new Firebelly Shalk pet

Be warned, the minions of Mehrunes Dagon are some of the most dangerous in Oblivion, and you may wish to recruit your strongest allies for this venture—good luck!

Devilish Daily Rewards

In addition to the pets you can earn via the portal achievements, the Flame Atronach Senche-Jaguar pet has also been added to Augusts Daily Login Rewards. Simply log in twice during the month of August to claim it!

The Flame Atronach Senche-Jaguar pet

Endeavor to Defeat Dagon

Finally, keep an eye out for special Endeavors during the month of August. This includes a new Weekly Endeavor that challenges you to complete 10 Oblivion Portals and daily portal-themed Endeavors that reward a larger-than-usual number of Seals.

The Forces of Oblivion Await

Join us in continuing the massive 10-Year Anniversary Celebration by venturing into the realm of Mehrunes Dagon and saving the Imperial province of Blackwood. Are you prepared to face the Daedra of the Deadlands this August? Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook—have fun!

item.title: Defeat Your Rivals & Earn Bonus Rewards During the Whitestrake's Mayhem Event!
item.description: Go toe-to-toe with your fellow players across Cyrodiil, the Imperial City, and Battlegrounds all while collecting exciting in-game rewards during the Whitestrake's Mayhem PvP event!
item.content:encoded:
Go toe-to-toe with your fellow players across Cyrodiil, the Imperial City, and Battlegrounds all while collecting exciting in-game rewards during the Whitestrake's Mayhem PvP event!

Mayhem Is On the Rise

The Whitestrake's Mayhem event makes its grand return to Tamriel next Thursday, July 25 at 10AM EDT, and runs until August 6 at 10AM EDT. Throughout the event, you will benefit from a 100% bonus to Alliance Point, XP, and Tel Var Stone gain. In addition, you can earn unique goodies by participating in ESO's PvP game modes.

Ready to clash against other adventurers on the battlefield? Simply follow the steps below:

  1. Head over to the in-game Crown Store and receive the “Details on the Whitestrake's Mayhem" quest
  2. Travel to your Alliance War faction's main gate in Cyrodiil using the Alliance War menu or a Battlegrounds camp outside major cities
    1. You do not need to travel to Cyrodiil to start the event
  3. Locate the NPC named “Predicant Maera" and continue the quest
    1. Note that if you've previously completed the quest, you won't need to do it again
  4. Complete the quest to receive a complimentary Pelinal's Boon Box

One key difference from previous years' events is that you no longer need to obtain or use the Scroll of Pelinal's Ferocity to benefit from the 100% buff to Alliance Point, XP, and Tel Var Stone gains. These bonuses are now shared passively to adventurers skirmishing throughout Cyrodiil, the Imperial City, and Battlegrounds. As a result, there is no longer a method to pick up the Scroll of Pelinal's Ferocity anywhere in-game, and those who already own the item will now notice it no longer offers any functionality.

Battle for Bonus Rewards

While participating in the Whitestrake's Mayhem in-game event, you can amass a collection of bonus in-game goodies for your heroic efforts.

NEW—Ayleid Lich Outfit Style Armor

Dominate both the living and the dead while donning the Ayleid Lich Armor, dropped in Pelinal's Boon Boxes.

Pelinal's Boon Boxes

You can earn Pelinal's Boon Boxes as rewards from the following activities throughout the event:

  • Battlegrounds quests from Battlemaster Rivyn
  • Scouting, Battle, Warfront, and Conquest Missions
  • Elder Scroll capture and recapture quests
  • Town quests in Vlastarus, Bruma, Cropsford, Cheydinhal, and Chorrol
  • Imperial City daily quests

Whenever you open a Pelinal's Boon Box, you have the chance to receive the following items:

  • Parcel of Tel Var Stones
  • Cyrodiil repair kit
  • Soul Gems
  • ONE of the following:
    • Alchemy Ingredients
    • Style item for your Alliance's armor style
    • Style item for Akaviri armor style
    • Daedric siege weapon
    • Whitestrake's Mayhem book furnishing
    • Forward Camp for your Alliance
    • Chapter of your Alliance's armor motif
      • There is a small chance that the full book may drop instead of a single chapter
    • Prismatic Runestone
    • Chapter for the Akaviri armor motif
      • There is a small chance that the full book may drop instead of a single chapter
    • Small chance to receive one or two fragments of the Alliance Breton Terrier pet
  • Small chance to receive a Transmute Geode
  • Very small chance to receive an unbound, tradeable Ayleid Lich Armor Style Page
    • A Dovah's Du'ul Style Page may drop instead if you've already earned the Ayleid Lich Armor Style Page

The Ayleid Lich Armor Style

Bonus Resources & The Golden

Are you a crafter? Keep a keen eye out as you travel from battle to battle as harvesting nodes in Cryodiil will yield additional resources throughout the event.

Additionally, the merchant Adhazabi “The Golden” Aba-daro will offer various CP160 jewelry from Cyrodiil item sets. Legendary necklaces will be available during the first weekend of Whitestrake's Mayhem and legendary rings from the same sets will be offered during the second.

Throughout the celebration, The Golden will not offer Monster Masks and all purchases in her shop will require Alliance Points. Contrary to her title, she will not accept gold.

The Impresario & Event Tickets

During Whitestrake's Mayhem, up to three Event Tickets can be earned each day by completing the following activities:

  • Two Event Tickets from the first Cyrodiil or Battlegrounds daily quest
    • This includes Bounty Board quests, a Town Daily, the Conquest Board quests, or the daily Battlegrounds quest
  • One Event Ticket from an Imperial City District daily quest

You can obtain a total of 39 Event Tickets by the event's end. Remember: you can only hold up to 12 Event Tickets at one time. Be sure to stop by the Impresario's market now and again to clear the way to collect more Tickets!

Acquire the Anchorborn Welwa's first fragment

Here's what the Impresario is offering during this event:

  • All three Molag Bal Illusion Imp pet fragments
    • Anchor Chain Fragment
    • Dark Anchor Pinion
    • Effigy of the Dominator
  • The first Anchorborn Welwa mount fragment
    • Bizarre Daedric Meat
  • Bag of Veteran's Glory (You can only hold one bag at a time. Be sure to collect your rewards from within before purchasing another!)
    • Group Repair Kit
    • Legion Zero Style Pages
    • Standard-Bearer Emotes
    • Second Legion Style Pages
    • Standard-Bearer Staves and Shields
    • Legion Zero Vigiles Pages
    • Ebonsteel Knight Armor Pages
    • Black Drake Clanwrap Style Pages
    • Black Drake Warpaint Face and Body Markings
    • Battle-Scared Body and Face Markings
    • House Dufort Banneret Style Pages
    • Tools of Domination Weapon Style Pages
    • Gloamsedge Outfit Style Pages
      • Bound Ayleid Lich Armor Style Pages
      • Group Repair Kits
      • Companion Guild Commendations

Additionally, the Impresario's Assistant will offer the following items which you can acquire with your tickets:

  • All three Unstable Morpholith pet Fragments
  • All three Soulfire Dragon Illusion pet Fragments
  • All three Deadlands Firewalker personality Fragments
  • All three Aurelic Quasigriff mount Fragments

Give these Indriks a new home

And lastly, Nenulaure at the Indrik Vendor's shop will include updated offerings that players can purchase with Event Tickets:

  • Onyx Indrik Berries
  • Onyx Indrik pet
  • Mossheart Indrik Berries
  • Mossheart Indrik pet

Victory and Glory Awaits!

It's time to test your mettle against fellow champions while earning tantalizing rewards as proof of your glory! Are you excited to charge onto the battlefield and clash against mighty warriors during this anarchic event period? Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook.

The Whitestrake's Mayhem in-game event begins Thursday, July 25 at 10AM EDT, and runs until Tuesday, August 6 at 10AM EDT.

item.title: Update 43 Preview—Tour ESO's Upcoming Base-Game Features & Improvements
item.description: Learn about Home Tours, updates to the Infinite Archive, and more with our sneak peek at Update 43!
item.content:encoded:
Learn about Home Tours, updates to the Infinite Archive, and more with our sneak peek at Update 43!

The Update 43 base-game patch is set to bring a ton of great features and improvements to all ESO players, completely free of charge, on August 19 for PC/Mac and September 4 for Xbox and PlayStation consoles.

Eager to check it out? You can test out the new update for yourself on the PC/Mac Public Test Server early next week—keep an eye out for the announcement blog! If you missed the preview livestream, or just want more details, check out what's coming below.

Home Tours

One of the year's most anticipated new features for Tamriel's housing enthusiasts is Home Tours, a new entry in the Activity Finder that shares and showcases listed player homes.

With Home Tours, you can search for homes owned and decorated by another player you know by searching for their UserID. You can also filter through other criteria like owner-applied labels for theme, such as “Libraries” or “Strongholds.” Of course, the creativity of many players defies such simple categorization, so if you're interested in seeing all sorts of homes or in viewing the most popular creations, you can browse the top player homes in the Recommended tab of Home Tours. Whatever way you search, friends and guildmates will be specially tagged in the feed for easy recognition.

Tour Tamriel together!

When you find a home that really impresses you, you can recommend it to others, as well as favorite it for yourself to visit later. You can even favorite homes you visit through other means, regardless of whether they are listed for Home Tours. There's a weekly limit on how many homes you can recommend, but no limit on how many you can visit and enjoy. Your own home may be featured as a recommended home in the Activity Finder if it becomes popular enough!

Infinite Archive Update

Update 43 also adds more depth to the Infinite Archive in the form of new maps, enemies, Verses and Visions, and updated loot, including new class item sets! This includes new hazard stages where the Archive itself presents a danger and a wider pool of foes to battle in maligraphic form.

Helping you tackle these new challenges are eight additional Verses and 10 additional Visions. For example, you can use the new Phalanx verse to call on ghostly soldiers to form a wall of defenders, collect the new Necrotic Vision set to unlock an Undead Avatar transformation that allows you to empower yourself with each defeated enemy, and more. You can also earn potent new consumable items that unlock a guaranteed transformation verse like the Undead Avatar, but getting them will not be easy!

Once you return to the Index with your hard-won Archival Fortunes, you can spend them on new rewards, whether as part of Filer Ool's rotating stock or purchased from new arrival Filer Brax, who stocks all gear from the class item sets. Filer Brax's inventory isn't limited to the existing seven sets from the Archive's launch, but also includes new sets like the gruesome Corpseburster set for Necromancers that detonates corpses your skills consume. As before, each of these sets is themed around a specific class skill line.

Quality of Life Improvements

The above new features and additions aren't the only focus of Update 43. Several smaller improvements included in Update 43 are aimed at making your time in Tamriel easier and more enjoyable.

For example, item curation, the system that prevents duplicate item drops within a set while you are still filling it out in Collections, expands to cover new sources. These include weekly Trial rewards, offerings from Imperial City vendors, and the Dungeon-specific reward chests for monster sets available for Undaunted Keys from Glirion the Redbeard, Maj-al Ragath, and Urgarlag Chief-bane at the Undaunted Enclaves.

The update also includes improvements to mount previews in the Crown Store, allowing you to preview and replay animations such as summoning or rearing up without needing to purchase a mount. Finally, many further smaller changes and bug fixes are included in Update 43. For example, Guild Trader and Guild Bank interfaces remember the last player Guild you interacted with in a play session.

Update 43 brings a host of new features, improvements, and fixes to Tamriel's adventurers, and you can test them out for yourself on PTS next week. Keep an eye out for those patch notes, too! Are you excited for the changes coming in the next base-game patch? Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook.

The Update 43 base-game patch arrives on August 19 for PC/Mac and September 4 for Xbox and PlayStation consoles.

Exclusive Free Items

Statuette: Auriel of Garlas Agea

A miniature statue of Auriel, King of the Aldmer. Based on the storied effigy of the same name in the ruins of Garlas Agea along the Gold Coast.

The Statuette: Auriel of Garlas Agea will be available in the Crown Store FREE, exclusively to ESO Plus Members on all platforms for a limited time, from July 29, 2024 at 10 AM EDT, to August 29, 2024 at 10 AM EDT.


Crown Gem and Seals of Endeavor Items

Vampiric Soulrazer Knight

The Soulrazer Knights of High Isle were intimidating enough on their own—before a vampire twisted that power to suit their needs. Now, you too can burn with a glorious, bloody purpose.

The Vampiric Soulrazer Knight polymorph will be available for Crown Gems and Seals of Endeavor on all platforms for a limited time, from July 11 to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT.


Legion Zero Charger

Battlemages within the perfidious Legion Zero conjure these powerful warhorses out of thin air using forbidden Daedric magic. The sight of this otherworldly charger inspires both fear and awe on the battlelines.

The Legion Zero Charger mount will be available for Crown Gems and Seals of Endeavor on all platforms for a limited time, from July 25 to August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Crafting

Crown Crafting Motif: Ra Gada Style

The Ra Gada or “Warrior Wave" of settlers from Yokuda actually took place in the First Era's ninth century. The second, or “Tavan" wave, revered holy Tava, Lady of the Air. Thus the Tavans' arms and armor are replete with bird imagery, which makes for a very distinctive crafting style. Use to learn the Ra Gada crafting style. Also teaches the equivalent Ra Gada Outfit Styles.

The Crown Crafting Motif: Ra Gada Style will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. Motif chapters, and very rarely the complete book, have a chance to drop from Focus Points (Group Events), and very rarely found by looting treasure chests or defeating Delve and World Bosses in Craglorn.


Outfit Style

Balorgh Arms Pack

The mighty Balorgh fell due to your skill. Commemorate this victory—alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Balorgh awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Balorgh Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 8, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Balorgh from veteran March of Sacrifices. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Hircine's Champion” increases the drop chances of both items.


The Blind Arms Pack

Fa-Nuit-Hen seeks champions to defeat the Blind Path cultists that have invaded Bedlam Veil. Perhaps you seek more visible signs of your victories than glory? Alter your weapon's appearance to match The Blind Weapons by using this complete set of The Blind Outfit styles.

The new Blind Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, at 10AM EDT. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from The Blind from veteran Bedlam Veil. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Lithe and Clever” increases the drop chances of both items.


Elder Scrolls Artifact: Skull of Corruption

Alter your staff's Outfit style with a replica of the Skull of Corruption Elder Scrolls Artifact, the signature weapon of the Daedric Prince Vaermina.

The Elder Scrolls Artifact: Skull of Corruption will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 11, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Ebonsteel Knight Arms Pack

Gather your gear and ready yourselves for mayhem! Alter your weapon's appearance by using this complete set of Ebonsteel Knight Outfit styles.

The new Ebonsteel Knight Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 11, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Matching armor pages will have a small chance to drop from the Bag of Veteran's Glory during Whitestrake's Mayhem. Bound versions of the armor pages can be purchased from the Impresario for 5 Event Tickets each during the event.


Vykosa Arms Pack

Legends claim that Vykosa, Khajiit huntress and Werewolf lord, was among the first turned by Hircine. Does that make you eager to face her in combat? Regardless, you can alter your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Vykosa awards by using this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Vykosa Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Vykosa the Ascendant from veteran Moon Hunter Keep. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Urgarlag Chief-bane for 50 undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Urgarlag's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “The Alpha Predator” increases the drop chances of both items.


Stormfist Arms Pack

Of course you vanquished the storm atronach known as Stormfist. Now celebrate your victory by altering your weapon's appearance to match the Undaunted Stormfist awards with this complete set of Outfit styles.

The Stormfist Arms Pack will return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT. The matching mask page will have a small chance to drop from Stormreeve Neidir from veteran Tempest Island. The matching shoulder page can be purchased from Glirion the Redbeard for 50 undaunted keys, or has a chance of dropping from Glirion's Mystery Coffer for 1 key. Having the achievement “Burial at Sea” increases the drop chances of both items.


Khenarthi's Pride Armor Pack

Blessed are those who don the trappings of the Wind God! Alter your armor's appearance by using this complete set of Khenarthi's Pride Outfit styles.

The Khenarthi's Pride Armor Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Ayleid Lich Arms Pack

Vastarie writes that “... like Mannimarco, liches of Ayleid provenance crave power as a starving creature hopes for its next meal.” Alter your weapon's appearance to match the Ayleid Lich Weapons by using this complete set of Ayleid Lich Outfit styles.

The new Ayleid Lich Arms Pack will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 6, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Matching armor pages will have a small chance to drop from Pelinal's Boon Box. Bound versions of the armor pages can be purchased from the Impresario for 5 Event Tickets each during the event.


Adornment

Adorable Assassin

Knock 'em dead with this casual hairstyle popularized by the Dark Elf assassins of Morrowind.

The Adorable Assassin adornment will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Anequine Oasis Eyes

"Though many dispute whether Khenarthi, S'rendarr, or another spirit grants these jade-green eyes to blessed individuals, all agree on one thing: Those who discover and share the location of an oasis to those in need earn them."—Sulema, Initiate Scholar

The Anequine Oasis Eyes adornment will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Whitestrake's Mayhem Crowns

This bundle includes all three Imperial crowns celebrating the Whitestrake's Mayhem event: the Circlet, the Coronet, and the Diadem.

The Whitestrake's Mayhem Crowns adornment will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Wardrobe

Moth Priest

"The priests of the Ancestor Moth are devoted to veneration of those who came before us, for the wisdom of the ancestors can sing the future into the present. As such, we alone have the privilege of interpreting the Elder Scrolls."—Sister Terran Arminus

The Moth Priest costume will return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 8, 2024 at 10AM EDT.


Naryu's Morag Tong Costume Bundle

Naryu Virian the Morag Tong assassin is nothing if not practical. Her functional, low-profile leather armor provides vital protection without compromising her agile acrobatics, and her pair of Morag Tong-style goggles keeps blood out of her eyes.

The Naryu's Morag Tong Costume Bundle will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Star-Made Wolfshead

Even if your background isn't Imperial, if you admire history's greatest warriors, you'll want to honor Pelinal Whitestrake with this costume from Whitestrake's Mayhem, the celebration that commemorates his deeds.

The Star-Made Wolfshead will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 1, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Jakarn's Ensemble

Jakarn is rugged, practical, and dashing. Dressing like him ensures that you never look like you're trying too hard. His well-tailored clothes always fetch the eyes of tavern beauties and never chafe when riding a stallion into the sunset.

The Jakarn's Ensemble will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 5, at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Skins

Shivering Isles Anointment

Butterflies. Glowing pink eyes. The Shivering Isles calls to you. Will you fight the call or bend the knee to the Mad God?

The Shivering Isles Anointment skin will return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 8, at 10AM EDT.


Ebony Epidermis

Never trust an alchemist with a Daedric scroll—you might end up with skin that's the color and hardness of Ebony! Unless you think that's a good idea, of course.

The Ebony Epidermis skin will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 29, at 10AM EDT.


Crate

Dark Chivalry Crate

A mystery collection of Dark Chivalry related items!

Dark Chivalry Crates will return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 11, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount when purchasing the ×15 Crate bundle of this item.


Events

Currency

Event Tickets

A ticket used to purchase rare goods from The Impresario, Event Merchant. Curious as to what goods? Well, chat with her to see what she has to offer!

Single Event Tickets will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time during the Whitestrike's Mayhem event, from July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 6, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Event Tickets are also giftable to other players from within the Crown Store.


Furniture

Furnishing Pack: Coldharbour Arcanaeum

A selection of furnishings for the true connoisseur of Molag Bal's darkest secrets. Includes a tear in the fabric of reality itself, perfect for impressing guests (voluntary or otherwise).

The Furnishing Pack: Coldharbour Arcanaeum will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Furnishing Pack: Azura

Furnishings associated with the Daedric Prince Azura.

The Furnishing Pack: Azura will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Target Serpent's Image, Trial

This is a large house item. This may be attacked and, when destroyed, will regenerate. This creature is equivalent to a veteran trial boss. Its abilities include granting a resource-restoring synergy opportunity, performance buffs, and self debuffs.

The new Target Serpent's Image, Trial will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT.


Houses

Ossa Accentium

Once the home of an eccentric merchant-collector, this sumptuous manor possesses a view framed by one of Fargrave's otherworldly skeletons plus offers easy access to all the amenities and exotic goods this city provides.

Ossa Accentium returns to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.


Linchal Grand Manor

This imposing estate in the Nibenese style was originally built as the summer manor of an Imperial City nobleman, now sadly deceased. Gardens with statues and a reflecting pool surround the stately walled mansion. Sumptuous!

The Linchal Grand Manor returns to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT. Furnished and unfurnished versions will be available.


Houseguests

Relic-Apprentice Marafar

With her initial Daedric studies finished, Marafar hopes to uncover more secrets as she assists Artaeum's Relicmaster. Will you host her efforts? After adding Marafar to your home, you can set her on a path, plus you and your visitors can speak with her.

Relic-Apprentice Marafar will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Assistants

Eri, Barking Banker

Eri has been expertly trained by Nord beast tamers to act as a very good (such a good!) personal banker for you and your groupmates. He doesn't venture to Cyrodiil or the Battlegrounds. Too much violence, not enough pets.

The new Eri, Barking Banker assistant will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 11, 2024 at 10AM EDT.


Mounts

Legion Zero Destrier

By forcing their steeds to consume the Blood of Coldharbour, the traitorous soldiers of Legion Zero created a war horse unlike any other. Adorned with fearsome barding and their sullen red colors, this is truly a mount to be feared.

The Legion Zero Destrier mount will return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT.


Nix-Ox Fabricant Steed

Programmed for obedience and fabricated for endurance, these synthetic Nix-Ox Steeds are the perfect mounts for ranging out from the Brass Fortress across the dangerous Radius.

The Nix-Ox Fabricant Steed mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 8 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Ebon Steel Dwarven Spider

Though Dwarven Metal was usually employed in building Spider constructs, for reasons unknown some rare variants were built with a darker Ebon Steel alloy. When found in working order, these automata are prized by collectors.

The Ebon Steel Dwarven Spider mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 8, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Lustrous Nix-Ox Fabricant Steed

Before Saints Llothis and Olms had to be confined in the Asylum Sanctorium, they used to ride through the Brass Fortress on holy days on these bizarre Fabricant mounts. But the parades are long gone, and the synthetic steeds have been repurposed.

The Lustrous Nix-Ox Fabricant Steed mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Grand Nibenese Stallion

Though some claim these horses are bred purely for show, the Grand Nibenese Stallion serves as more than just a good luck charm in Leyawiin. They possess a keen intelligence and even temperament—maintaining their composure, even on crowded streets.

The Grand Nibenese Stallion mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Hivethief Vvardvark

"Look at that tongue! You can thank Spellwright Domavas for these bug-eating beauties, expanding on Magister Varkenel's work. I hear he first tried to give them feathers, failed, then came up with this gorgeous steed."—Cidius Sosia, Necrom Stablemaster

The Hivethief Vvardvark mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 18, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Hist Guar

In Black Marsh this mount is called Scales-Seem-Daubed-with-Hist-Sap, but the rest of Tamriel just calls it the Hist Guar. It is the only subspecies of guar known to enjoy music.

The Hist Guar mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 22, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Queen's Claw Senche-raht

A scholar studying Mnemoli the Blue Star as well as a Whispering Claw warrior, this Senche-raht serves Queen Khamira with both brain and brawn. He volunteered to travel with you, lending you speed and steady companionship.

The Queen's Claw Senche-raht mount will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Customized Actions

Ashen Runegathering

With a flourish of your sharp Ashlander blade, you collect a runestone in the manner taught to you by the people of the wastes.

The Ashen Runegathering customized action will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 8, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Memento

Blossom Bloom

This eternally blooming flower once graced the boudoir of a Dibellan high priest. Gifted to you for services rendered, you may now command it yourself.

The Blossom Bloom memento will return to the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 8, 2024 at 10AM EDT.


Pets

Firepot Spider

In the Clockwork City, mechanical Firepot Spiders can be programmed to follow chefs around like little walking barbecues. Someone has devised a secret method for exporting them from Sotha Sil's hidden world—but how? Better get one while you still can.

The Firepot Spider pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 3, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 8, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Small Bone Dragon Construct

This construct resembles a great and fearsome Bone Dragon, but it's actually a product of the Necromancer's art, assembled from modern bird and reptile bones and then reanimated.

The Small Bone Dragon Construct pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 8, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to July 15, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Brimstone Nixad

The legend among the underworld explorers of the Undaunted is that these little incendiary sprites are responsible for lighting all the candles, torches, and lanterns found burning underground, flying ahead of adventurers to ignite them in the dark.

The Brimstone Nixad pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 25, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 1, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Hearthfire Hatchling

Hearthfire Hatchlings, which are found only in an orphaned state, appear to be the offspring of a normal kagouti and one of the Hearthfire variety. Driven away by ordinary kagouti, these hatchlings are in grave need of adoption.

The Hearthfire Hatchling pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Helkarn Wolf Pup

The pups of the Helkarn Wolves from Elsweyr are almost as sociable with people as dog puppies, so they get a lot of attention when young. This probably contributes to their docility as mounts when full grown.

The Helkarn Wolf Pup pet will be available in the Crown Store on all platforms for a limited time, from July 29, 2024 at 10AM EDT, to August 5, 2024 at 10AM EDT. ESO Plus Members will receive a discount on this item.


Whether you're looking for furry (and occasionally scaly) friends for your home, sinister and shimmering skins to show off, or exotic weapons and armor to best your rivals with on the battlefield, there's no shortage of fantastic deals in the Crown Store this July! Have an idea of which goodies you'll want to add to your collection? Be sure to stock up on crowns by heading over to the Buy Crowns page beforehand.

What new or returning item(s) are you most excited to pick up this month? Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook.

item.title: ESO's July 2024 Survival Guide
item.description: The Gold Road Chapter is live, but there's still an incredible amount of fun on the horizon for ESO's adventurers. Check out (almost) everything coming to the game this July 2024!
item.content:encoded:
The Gold Road Chapter is live, but there's still an incredible amount of fun on the horizon for ESO's adventurers. Check out (almost) everything coming to the game this July 2024!

As your adventures in West Weald (and beyond) continue, July introduces a host of exciting new events, promotions, and rewards. Get the inside scoop on a very busy month for ESO's adventurers with another chronological breakdown!


Daily Login Rewards (7/1 – 7/30)

As is tradition, a host of wonderful Daily Login rewards are lined up for you throughout the month of July. This includes the fan-favorite Clockwork City DLC on Day 2, so don't miss it!


Anniversary Spotlight—Morrowind & Clockwork City (7/2-8/15)

Venture into the home of the Dark Elves and complete the Vvardenfell main storyline to unlock a unique customizable action. A special themed Endeavors is also on offer—Vivec needs you!


ESO Live Update 43 Preview Livestream (7/3)

The ESO Community Team gives you a first look at the upcoming Update 43 base-game patch via Twitch.tv/Bethesda! Check elderscrollsonline.com next week for details.


Update 43 on Public Test Server (7/8)

If you're on PC/Mac, you can check out (and help us test) the upcoming Update 43 base-game patch!


Chaos Ball Weekend (7/11-7/16)

Get the (chaos)ball and fight to hold it! Tamriel's PvP Battlegrounds competitors can enjoy solo and group queues for this specific match until July 16. Don't forget, there's also a 25% boost to Alliance Point gains.


100% XP Boost Mini-Event (7/18-7/23)

Leveling up a new character? Enjoy a substantial boost to XP gains from July 18 until July 23—no questions asked!


Whitestrake's Mayhem In-Game Event (7/25-8/6)

To arms! ESO's PvP warriors take to Cyrodiil, the Imperial City, and Battlegrounds where they can enjoy bonus rewards, including Event Tickets, buffs to Alliance Points gains, and more. Look for our official announcement blog to find out more later in July.


Alienware 10-Year Anniversary July Giveaway (July)

As part of the ongoing 10-Year Anniversary Celebration, you can log into the Alienware Vault during the month of July for a chance to receive a free code for the Gold Road Chapter. Keep an eye on elderscrollsonline.com and Alienware Arena for more details soon!

10-Year Anniversary July Roadmap

As promised, July is another huge month for ESO and its many adventurers, so be sure to look out for more information on the above items closer to their live dates. Note that some details and dates may change between now and when the above promotions begin.

Are you eager to continue the 10-Year Anniversary Celebration with us? Let us know via X (formerly Twitter), Instagram, and Facebook.

item.title: Daily Login Rewards—July 2024
item.description: Get in gear this July with these rewards you can earn simply by logging in, including a free DLC!
item.content:encoded:
Get in gear this July with these rewards you can earn simply by logging in, including a free DLC!

We're not here to wind you up or grind your gears—there's a free DLC available this month, just one of the great offerings you can acquire by logging in! Curious to learn more about Daily Login Rewards? Check out this help article to discover all you need to know.

Now, let's take a peek at some of the highlights you can receive throughout July 2024:


Clockwork City DLC—Day 2

Claim a free DLC and set the gears of a new story in motion!

Log in for just two days this upcoming month to gain the Clockwork City DLC for free! That means a new zone with a unique storyline, encounters, item sets, and more. Enter the realm of Sotha Sil and meet the Clockwork God himself.


Wild Hunt Crown Crates—Day 3-7

Go wild with free crown crates!

Collect a Wild Hunt Crown Crate every day from your third to your seventh login during the month of July for a total of five crates. You can preview the kinds of items available in Wild Hunt Crown Crates in this blog.


Seals of Endeavor×500—Day 9

Take your pick of crown crate goods

No one has been this fancy since the Ayleid Empire fell!

Everybody loves monocles, right? They're just so delightfully stylish. And what could represent greater style—nay, grandeur—than an ancient monocle of the finest Ayleid glass? Nothing, that's what. So, claim yours by logging in for fourteen days this July.
